property.value: Phoenix Clan Daimyo Earth Void Shugenja Alchemist Loyal Unique

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Lion Clan Samurai Tactician Battle: Target a Personality with equal or lower Chi: Bow or straighten him.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Crane Clan Air Shugenja Experienced Unique Limited: Bow your target Temple: Draw a card.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Phoenix Clan Water Monk Henshin Open: Give Hayate Cavalry, Naval, or Tactician.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Phoenix Clan Air Shugenja Inquisitor Magistrate Open: Target a Personality: If he is Kolat, Ninja, or Shadowlands, his base abilities may not be used. Give him Kolat, Ninja, or Shadowlands.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: After Atosa enters play: Lose 2 Honor and discard all other Sensei Personalities you control. Your Gaijin Personalities in and out of play (including Atosa) have your Clan alignment.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Scorpion Clan Samurai Paragon Yojimbo Loyal Enters play paying 2 less Gold if you control a Courtier.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Scorpion Clan Nonhuman Tamamo-no-Mae Courtier Open: If it is another player's turn, target one of his Personalities: Before this phase ends, straighten him. Before this turn ends, if the Personality was not assigned to attack this turn, dishonor him and his controller loses Honor equal to his base Personal Honor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Scorpion Clan • Samurai • Paragon • Yojimbo • Experienced • Loyal • Unique Battle: Target an enemy Personality: Bow him. If you control a Courtier, negate the effects of the next action the target performs (this turn).

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Earth Limited Bow this Shugenja, you may destroy this card if he is Earth, and target your Spirit Personality: If you destroyed this card, gain Honor equal to the Spirit's Personal Honor; if you did not destroy it, gain 1 Honor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Choose your performing Berserker or unbowed Personality and target an enemy card with lower Force and no attachments: Destroy it.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Remove this card from the game: Each player chooses zero to two Personalities at the current battlefield. Remove them from the game; cards and tokens stay attached to them. After the next turn begins, each unit enters play in its owner's home, ignoring costs, restrictions, and entering-play effects; then, give them each three +1F Blood tokens.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Fire Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Personality: Melee Attack with strength equal to 3 plus the number of Fire tokens on him and the number of Rings you control.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Magistrate and target an enemy Personality: Move him home. If he is dishonorable, Kolat, Ninja, or Shadowlands, choose a player who gains or loses 2 Honor.

card.name: Celestial Sword of the Crab - exp

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Weapon • Experienced • Unique • Yuruginai Will only attach to a Crab Clan Personality.This card has +1F for each Crab Clan Personality you control. After this card enters play: Gain 2 Honor.Battle/Open: Even if this card is bowed: Straighten this unit.

card.name: Celestial Sword of the Crane - exp

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Weapon • Experienced • Unique • Megumi Will only attach to a Crane Clan Personality.This card has +1F for each Crane Clan Personality you control.After this card enters play: Gain 2 Honor.Political Open: Target a Personality or Follower and you may discard the Imperial Favor: Give the target -4F. If you discarded the Imperial Favor, gain 1 Honor.

card.name: Celestial Sword of the Phoenix - exp

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Weapon • Experienced • Unique • Keitaku Will only attach to a Phoenix Clan Personality. This card has +1F for each Phoenix Clan Personality you control. After this card enters play: Gain 2 Honor.Battle/Open: Target your honorably dead Phoenix Clan Personality: Bring him into play at this card's location, ignoring costs. Remove him from the game before the turn ends.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Maho While this Shugenja is Shadowlands, your opposed Nonhumans have +1F. Open: Bow this card and choose your performing Nonhuman: Give him the ability, "Battle: Melee Attack with strength equal to this card's Force." Lose 3 Honor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Crab Clan Nonhuman Elephant Will not attach Items. May not perform Iaijutsu or Political actions. Melee Attacks may not target Chiisai's Followers. Fear Battle: Target an enemy Personality with 5 or lower Force: Chiisai charges him. Move him home.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Shadowlands • Shugenja • Corrupter • Experienced Hitaka • Unique After Hitaka enters play: Lose 4 Honor. Limited: Target a non-Stronghold Jade card: Destroy it. Limited: Destroy Hitaka and target an Oni in your discard pile: Bring it into play, paying 9 less Gold.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Ashigaru After this card enters play from your hand: Draw an additional card during your next End Phase.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Political Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Courtier or Magistrate and target a Personality: Dishonor him. His controller loses 1 Honor. After the next time (this turn) another player's action resolves that targeted your performer or a battle resolves which destroyed him, the target's controller loses 2 Honor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: As a Focus Effect: After this duel ends, choose a player who loses 2 Honor. Reaction: After one of your Personalities is destroyed: Create a Maimed • Retainer Holding with the ability, "Battle/Open: Destroy this card and target a Personality: Straighten him. Rehonor him."

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Terrain After an action resolves that one or more of your Personalities at the current battlefield performed: You may move any of those performers home. After an action resolves that one or more of your Personalities at the current battlefield performed: You may move any of those performers home.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Crane Clan Courtier Merchant Political Open: Discard the Imperial Favor and target a Personality: Sosuke raises tariffs. Bow a card without attachments in the target's unit, or bow his unit if he is Mantis Clan.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Crane Clan • Samurai • Iron Crane • Scout

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Spider Clan • Shadowlands • Samurai • Commander • Conqueror After Arakan enters play: Lose 1 Honor.Battle: Target an enemy Personality or Follower: Give it -4F. Bow it if its Force is now 0 or it is Lion Clan.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Spider Clan • Shadowlands • Samurai • Paragon • Dark Dementia Battle: Melee 4 Attack.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Choose your performing Personality with 7 or more base Force: Negate all current and new Force penalties on him and effects which prevent him from contributing Force. He contributes Force even while bowed.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Even if you control no units at the current battlefield, target a Personality there: Move him to an unresolved battlefield where he would be opposed.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Kiho Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Henshin and target an enemy card without attachments: Put it on top of its owner's deck.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Unique Search your Fate deck or discard pile for a card titled Blood of the Preserver, show it, and put it into your hand.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Unique Until your third turn from now ends, you have the trait, "In your Dynasty Phase, one time for each of your provinces destroyed this game, you may refill one of your provinces face-up."

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Iaijutsu As a Focus Effect: Give +1 Focus Value to each of your focused cards. Battle/Limited: Choose your performing unbowed Personality and target another player's Personality: Your Personality challenges the target. He may refuse; if he did, draw two cards. Bow the duel's loser.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Reaction: After a Personality enters play, if his controller paid less than his base Gold Cost for him, bow your performing Merchant: The Personality's controller loses Honor equal to his base Personal Honor, or 3, whichever is lower. Battle: Pay Gold equal to a target unit's total Gold Cost minus 5: Move it home. Its controller loses 2 Honor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Nonhuman Elephant Cavalry Fear Battle: Target an enemy card with equal or lower Force: If it is bowed or an attachment, destroy it. Bow it.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: This Province has +2 Strength. Reaction: After a Melee or Ranged Attack is targeted: Give it -2 strength.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Terrain Before this battle resolves: If your army has more total Force than the enemy army, reduce the Force of each Personality and Follower in it to zero. Battle: If there is no Terrain in play at the current battlefield: Put this card into play there.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Open: Choose your performing Personality: Show the top four cards of your Fate deck. You may attach one of them that is a Weapon to him, paying 4 less Gold. You may shuffle your deck. If you did not show a Weapon and he is a Kensai, draw a card.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Open: Target a Personality: You deceive him with a forged order. His controller puts all cards in his provinces at the bottom of his Dynasty deck in any order, refilling them face-up.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Bushido Virtue Honesty Limited: Choose your performing Samurai and show a Strategy in your hand: After the next time you resolve an action from a card with the Strategy's title this turn, if you have announced no other actions on Strategies between now and then, permanently give your Samurai the ability, "Limited: Gain 1 Honor."

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Kolat Unique This card's base ability will not be copied. All players have the ability, "Open: Pay 6 Gold: Destroy a card titled Fortress of Lidless Eyes." Open: Once per game, target a Personality: Bow him. Negate his straightening while this card remains in play.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Spider Clan Shadowlands Ninja Displacer Battle: Target a non-Unique enemy Personality: Turn all cards in his controller's provinces face-up. You may overlay a face-up Personality in one of the provinces on the target, refilling the province with the target.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: You may only play one copy of Grief in reaction to any one resolution. Reaction: After an action resolves whose effects destroyed a player's Personality, target a Personality controlled by the same player: He is overcome with grief. Dishonor him. His controller loses Honor equal to his base Personal Honor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Cavalry Battle: If this card is opposed, discard a card: Give this card +3F.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Crab Clan Berserker Experienced Unique Nikaru uses his Force as his duel stat in duels from other players' cards. Battle: Negate the effects of the next Battle action this battle another player takes which targets Nikaru.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Ninja Reaction: After an action resolves which moved your Personality in a Ninja unit home: Move him to a different battlefield than the one from which he was moved home.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Lion Clan Samurai Scout Battle: Ranged 4 Attack, with +1 strength if it targeted a Spider Clan Personality. You may discard a Terrain from your hand or destroy a Terrain in play; if you did either, draw a card.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Unique Until the game ends, at the end of each phase, lower each player's Honor to what it was at the start of that phase plus 3 plus any Honor he gained from battle resolution that phase; this Honor loss will not be negated, substituted or reduced.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Choose your performing opposed Personality: Give him +2F, or +4F if he has an attachment.

property.value: Water Battle: If this Shugenja is opposed, destroy this card: Create a 2F/2C/3PH Samurai • Ancestor • Spirit Personality with your Clan alignment at the current battlefield. If this Shugenja is Water and defending, create two such Personalities instead.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Paragon and target an enemy Personality: Reduce his Force by your Paragon's Force. Draw a card. You may take an additional Battle action. Lose 5 Honor.

property.name: Text Box

property.name: Text Box

property.value: Battle: Choose your performing Scout Personality and target an enemy Personality: Give him -4F. If you have Reconnaissance, you may target one of his attachments and put it in his owner's hand. You may move your Scout home.

property.value: Ninja Limited: Choose your performing unbowed Ninja Personality and target another player's Personality: Create a battlefield (not at any province). Assign your Personality to attack there. Assign the target to defend there, even if he is bowed. Fight a battle there, in which you have the first opportunity to take a Battle action or pass. Lose 5 Honor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Scorpion Clan • Ninja • Acrobat • Experienced Bayushi Keirei • Unique Battle: Move Keirei from the current battlefield to a different battlefield. You may target and give a Personality at Keirei's new or previous location two -1F/-1C Poison tokens.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Dragon Clan • Nonhuman • Golem • Earth • Shugenja • Protector • Spirit Shugorei has -2F while it is your turn. Limited: If you are a Dragon Clan player and none of your provinces have been destroyed since your last turn ended: Gain 2 Honor.

After each time he is assigned to attack this turn, gain 2 Honor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Open: Choose your performing Spirit Personality and target a Personality controlled by the active player: His controller must declare a normal attack this turn and assign the target (if legal).

property.value: Reaction: Before a battle resolves, choose your performing opposed Samurai Personality at the current battlefield: Give him +2F.

property.value: Tactical Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Tactician and target an enemy card without attachments: Destroy it.

property.value: Earth Battle: Bow this Shugenja, or bow this card if he is Earth, and target an enemy card without attachments: Destroy it.

property.value: Limited: Put a Spell from your hand face-up underneath this card. property.value: Battle: Bow this card: Ranged 5 Attack.

property.value: This Personality has Conqueror.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: After an action resolves that created a duel your Personality won during a Combat Segment, once per Personality per battle: Negate his next bowing, movement, or destruction from other players' cards' effects.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Target your Paragon: Create a Personality with the same base Chi, Personal Honor and keywords as the target, and whose base Force equals that target's Personal Honor. Remove the Personality from the game after the battle ends.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Personality and target an enemy card without attachments: Bow it. You may bow your Personality; if you did, draw a card.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle/Open: Target a Personality: His controller may choose to bow him. If he did not choose this, he must pass at his next opportunity this phase to take a Battle, Limited, or Open action.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Mountain Terrain Battle: If there is no Terrain in play at the current battlefield, bow your performing Scout and target an enemy card without attachments: Destroy it. Put this card into play there.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Unicorn Clan • Samurai • Battle Maiden • Cavalry • Paragon

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Melee and Ranged Attacks targeting this Personality have -5 strength

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Reaction: After this card enters play: Create a +2F/+1C Weapon Item and attach it to this Personality (if legal).

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Farm Limited: Destroy this card: Search your Dynasty deck for a non-Unique Farm Holding with another title and put it into play, unbowed, paying 2 less Gold.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Tattoo Void Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Tattooed Personality, target a Tattoo Strategy in your discard pile, discard a card unless your Personality is Void, and remove this card from the game: Put the Tattoo into your hand. You may take an additional Battle action.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Air Reaction: After another player's Battle action targets this Shugenja, or any Personality you control if this Shugenja is Air, destroy this card: Negate the target's destruction from the action's effects. Battle: Move this unit home.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Unique Until the game ends, before the second or later time each turn another player's card's effect bows any of your Personalities during the Action Phase, negate that effect, and before the second or later time each turn another player's card's effect prevents any of your Personalities from assigning, negate that effect.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Cavalry Scout Recon Reaction: After engaging at this card's battlefield: You have Reconnaissance there. Give your other Followers there +1F.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Recon Reaction: After engaging, choose your performing Scout at the current battlefield and target a card in a unit there: You have Reconnaissance there. Abilities on cards (now) in the target's unit may not be used.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Your Spells enter play paying 1 less Gold.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Spider Clan • Monk • Kensai • Order of the Spider • Experienced • Unique Before you lose Honor: Reduce the loss by 1. Fear Battle: Target another Personality: Yamazaki threatens him. Straighten him. If Yamazaki has a Weapon, you may target and bow an enemy card.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Air Experienced After this card enters play, if this Shugenja is Air: Gain 1 Honor.Limited: Once per game: Create a +1F/+1C Air • Weapon Item with the ability, "Battle: Give each Personality and Follower in the enemy army -1F" and attach it to one of your Personalities.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Crab Clan • Courtier • Merchant • Tax Collector Reaction: After another player's Battle action targets one of your Merchants, pay 2 Gold: Either negate its effects on him or make the player lose 2 Honor.Battle: Even if Ikke is not at the current battlefield, target your Merchant: Move him home.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Mantis Clan Samurai Naval Scout Battle: One Ranged Attack from your next Ranged Attack action this battle may target a Personality with attached Followers. If you have Reconnaissance, you may take an additional Battle action.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Mantis Clan Samurai Magistrate Naval Other players' Personalities and attachments (in play) have -2 Gold Cost. Battle: Target an enemy Personality: Move him home. If he is Crane Clan, bow him.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Mantis Clan • Samurai • Kensai • Naval • Tactician

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Air Fear Battle: Target an enemy Personality with lower Chi than this Shugenja: Give the target -4F. If this Shugenja is Air, actions the target performs may not target this Shugenja.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Lion Clan • Nonhuman • Zokujin • Earth Reaction: When paying a Gold cost, destroy your target Mine or Farm: Produce Gold equal to its base Gold Cost.
